email_subject: MSN 8.0 on deck and on a roll, CyberSLAPPs explained (CNET INTERNET SERVICES)
email_body: On the surface, it seems odd that Microsoft and AOL compete with one another. After all, while Microsoft is a giant software powerhouse, AOL Time Warner is totally different--a giant media powerhouse. Nonetheless, they're at it again, working like crazy to dominate the ISP space. While AOL is busy renovating the guts of upcoming AOL 8.0, which will finally integrate the Netscape browser, Microsoft is nipping at its competition's heels with MSN 8.0. Will Microsoft make enough improvements to finally catch up with AOL? It just might. Find out more in our MSN 8.0 First Take.
